publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2715 Roseanna Cunningham: The Scottish Arts Council and VisitScotland Traditional Music and Tourism Initiative 2002-That the Parliament welcomes the publication of the joint Scottish Arts Council and VisitScotland document A Soundtrack for Scottish Tourism which describes a variety of pilot projects operating in a number of different areas throughout Scotland from 1999 to 2002; notes the widespread local, national and international interest shown in each project; further notes that the effect on all local areas involved included clear business and tourism benefits in both the short and longer term; recognises the uniqueness of Scotland's traditional culture and the enormous contribution it can make to revitalising the tourist sector and, in particular, the rural economy, and calls on all local authorities to investigate ways in which they can further encourage traditional culture in their respective areas.

S1M-2715 The Scottish Arts Council and VisitScotland Traditional Music and Tourism Initiative 2002 (lodged on 6 February 2002) Brian Adam*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr John McAllion*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Fergusson*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Sandra White*
